item.title: Jean.Machine
item.description: Autumn/Winter 13 Lookbook for fashion brand, Jean Machine. Jean Machine was the definitive denim store in the UK in the 1970s, and this year the label has been revived as Jean.Machine, a premium men's denim line, designed to deliver the ease and confidence of the original Jean Machine brand.
item.content:encoded: Autumn/Winter 13 Lookbook for fashion brand, Jean Machine. Jean Machine was the definitive denim store in the UK in the 1970s, and this year the label has been revived as Jean.Machine, a premium men's denim line, designed to deliver the ease and confidence of the original Jean Machine brand.

item.title: Chá Literário Visual Identity
item.description: "Chá Literário" Literary Tea was a poetry event at Cerco's High School with the intention to make students want to participate in literary activities and develop their skills. Based on the metaphors and ornaments of poetry, the hole identity was set in an ornament typeface (Didot Ornaments 2) as a system to create a metaphor for the logo, poster and brochure, in order to create a beautiful and delicate piece, which you can admire, even you don't fully understand it at first sight.
item.content:encoded: "Chá Literário" Literary Tea was a poetry event at Cerco's High School with the intention to make students want to participate in literary activities and develop their skills. Based on the metaphors and ornaments of poetry, the hole identity was set in an ornament typeface (Didot Ornaments 2) as a system to create a metaphor for the logo, poster and brochure, in order to create a beautiful and delicate piece, which you can admire, even you don't fully understand it at first sight.

item.title: Fénix (FREE Typeface)
item.description: Fénix is a serif typeface designed for display and long texts, its foundations are based in calligraphy, with strong serifs and rough strokes. Its proportions seek to gain space in height and width. Fénix is elegant at large sizes and legible at the same time, with a lot of rhythm in small sizes.
item.content:encoded: Fénix is a serif typeface designed for display and long texts, its foundations are based in calligraphy, with strong serifs and rough strokes. Its proportions seek to gain space in height and width. Fénix is elegant at large sizes and legible at the same time, with a lot of rhythm in small sizes.

item.title: PACT
item.description: PACT is an open space where partnerships between like-minded businesses are housed. The clients different backgrounds in hairstyling, food and fashion, challenged the agency to create distinction amidst homogenising the brand experience. We first went about designing a unifying element with the use of the ampersand (&) symbol, altering its structure to spell PACT. The ampersand celebrates partnerships and is positive about the likelihood of future collaborations. The design execution of marbling was chosen to depict three dissimilar businesses coming together to form a single-minded entity. The swirls and mix of marbling underlines the brands reflexive yet determined vision of celebrating partnerships.
item.content:encoded: PACT is an open space where partnerships between like-minded businesses are housed. The clients different backgrounds in hairstyling, food and fashion, challenged the agency to create distinction amidst homogenising the brand experience. We first went about designing a unifying element with the use of the ampersand (&) symbol, altering its structure to spell PACT. The ampersand celebrates partnerships and is positive about the likelihood of future collaborations. The design execution of marbling was chosen to depict three dissimilar businesses coming together to form a single-minded entity. The swirls and mix of marbling underlines the brands reflexive yet determined vision of celebrating partnerships.

item.title: Nothing Gold Can Stay: Alexander McQueen F/W 2012
item.description: Inspired by McQueen creative director Sarah Burtons approach, whose aim in this collection was to show a lightness, the sense that the dresses were hovering, Nothing Gold Can Stay is a five piece animated editorial that situates each garment floating in an open sky amidst a sea of passing clouds. The clouds, varying in size and shape, pass through each composition in a different direction meant to create the effect of the garments swinging back and forth in the open air. Sped up to cut the overall frame account, the movement in each GIF takes on a more time-lapse feel. All elements are hand drawn and arranged for animation with AfterEffects.
item.content:encoded: Inspired by McQueen creative director Sarah Burtons approach, whose aim in this collection was to show a lightness, the sense that the dresses were hovering, Nothing Gold Can Stay is a five piece animated editorial that situates each garment floating in an open sky amidst a sea of passing clouds. The clouds, varying in size and shape, pass through each composition in a different direction meant to create the effect of the garments swinging back and forth in the open air. Sped up to cut the overall frame account, the movement in each GIF takes on a more time-lapse feel. All elements are hand drawn and arranged for animation with AfterEffects.

item.title: Reclaim
item.description: Designers Against Child Slavery is proud to announce the release of it's third exhibition entitled: Reclaim. Consisting of work centered around the theme of hope and freedom, "Reclaim" was produced by over 40 artists from around the globe over the course of the past 10 months. Reclaim is based around the story of a girl named Mint. Mint is a former trafficking victim and a current employee of our friends at The Blind Project in their Biographe Lab in Bangkok, Thailand.
item.content:encoded: Designers Against Child Slavery is proud to announce the release of it's third exhibition entitled: Reclaim. Consisting of work centered around the theme of hope and freedom, "Reclaim" was produced by over 40 artists from around the globe over the course of the past 10 months. Reclaim is based around the story of a girl named Mint. Mint is a former trafficking victim and a current employee of our friends at The Blind Project in their Biographe Lab in Bangkok, Thailand.

item.title: CORNELIA and CO [ Brand identity & Packaging ]
item.description: Located in Barcelona city since 2010, Cornelia and Co is a restaurant, a bakery, a winery, a coffe shop and many other things. A place where you can buy many gourmet products, a pack of fresh pasta or take an exotic tea. Inspired in the graphic design of the central europe between the 30' and 40' (called "interwar years") all graphic materials are printed only in black ink and white serigraphy, over industrial raw papers and cardboards, honoring those years of poverty.
item.content:encoded: Located in Barcelona city since 2010, Cornelia and Co is a restaurant, a bakery, a winery, a coffe shop and many other things. A place where you can buy many gourmet products, a pack of fresh pasta or take an exotic tea. Inspired in the graphic design of the central europe between the 30' and 40' (called "interwar years") all graphic materials are printed only in black ink and white serigraphy, over industrial raw papers and cardboards, honoring those years of poverty.

item.title: Eugene Onegin book
item.description: Illustrated book "Eugene Onegin", a Russian novel in verse written by Alexander Pushkin. He is considered the central representative of The Age of Romanticism in Russian literature.The main protagonist is Eugene Onegin, a bored, selfish and world-weary cynic St. Petersburg dandy, whose life consists of balls, concerts, parties and nothing more. Onegin, who has taken over his uncle's estate in the country, spurns the love of the shy, bookish Tatyana Larina intensely drawn to Him. We wished to add a personal interpretation. We thought to represent the complex psychology of the protagonists with the symbols of nature: the Russian countryside, woods, winter, snow, fire. Tatiana is the fire of passion, love. She is the ideal of Russian Woman. Onegin is cold, melancholy, dark for his existential distress, for his inability to adapt to the real world. The book is admired for the artfulness of its verse narrative as well as for its exploration of life, death, love, ennui, convention and passion. For more http://www.balbusso.com
item.content:encoded: Illustrated book "Eugene Onegin", a Russian novel in verse written by Alexander Pushkin. He is considered the central representative of The Age of Romanticism in Russian literature.The main protagonist is Eugene Onegin, a bored, selfish and world-weary cynic St. Petersburg dandy, whose life consists of balls, concerts, parties and nothing more. Onegin, who has taken over his uncle's estate in the country, spurns the love of the shy, bookish Tatyana Larina intensely drawn to Him. We wished to add a personal interpretation. We thought to represent the complex psychology of the protagonists with the symbols of nature: the Russian countryside, woods, winter, snow, fire. Tatiana is the fire of passion, love. She is the ideal of Russian Woman. Onegin is cold, melancholy, dark for his existential distress, for his inability to adapt to the real world. The book is admired for the artfulness of its verse narrative as well as for its exploration of life, death, love, ennui, convention and passion. For more http://www.balbusso.com

item.title: Bellissima Script
item.description: While in the same vein and spirit as Burgues and Compendium, Bellissima began from an entirely different thread as those fonts. It started with Alex Trochut generously showing me a gorgeous lettering book from his grandfathers library: Bellezas de la Caligrafía, by Ramón Stirling, 1844. Stirling was one of the Latin calligraphy pioneers who introduced a refined version of English calligraphy in Spain and made it popular in the nineteenth century. Some scans from that book served as initial basis for the caps in my Poem Script. But it was always in the back of my mind that I should do a copperplate, and the Stirling model was the perfect source. My intention was to veer away from Stirlings exuberant ornamentation, and work within simplified forms of his ideas. As it usually is with most of my projects, Bellissima became its own bird and shaped its own flying patterns. Suddenly there were many ligatures, multiple endings and swashed connections, hundreds of alternates for both uppercase and lowercase. Bellissima has an effusive energy that appeals much beyond its sourcing. Its intended for these modern times of appreciation for old crafty things like stationary and letterpress, where its origins help it shine brightly. Bellissima Script Pro is a complete font with almost 2000 characters full of alternates, swashes, ligatures & ornaments covering a wide palette of latin languages and Bellissima Script Redux is a random sample of glyphs totally usable with a reduced price.
item.content:encoded: While in the same vein and spirit as Burgues and Compendium, Bellissima began from an entirely different thread as those fonts. It started with Alex Trochut generously showing me a gorgeous lettering book from his grandfathers library: Bellezas de la Caligrafía, by Ramón Stirling, 1844. Stirling was one of the Latin calligraphy pioneers who introduced a refined version of English calligraphy in Spain and made it popular in the nineteenth century. Some scans from that book served as initial basis for the caps in my Poem Script. But it was always in the back of my mind that I should do a copperplate, and the Stirling model was the perfect source. My intention was to veer away from Stirlings exuberant ornamentation, and work within simplified forms of his ideas. As it usually is with most of my projects, Bellissima became its own bird and shaped its own flying patterns. Suddenly there were many ligatures, multiple endings and swashed connections, hundreds of alternates for both uppercase and lowercase. Bellissima has an effusive energy that appeals much beyond its sourcing. Its intended for these modern times of appreciation for old crafty things like stationary and letterpress, where its origins help it shine brightly. Bellissima Script Pro is a complete font with almost 2000 characters full of alternates, swashes, ligatures & ornaments covering a wide palette of latin languages and Bellissima Script Redux is a random sample of glyphs totally usable with a reduced price.

item.title: MICA
item.description: MICA is a contemporary jewellery house which specialises in custom made pieces. Its name derives from a group of minerals that are characterised by their malleability which makes them ideal for various uses some which are purely aesthetic. Expanding its most basic and primitive character, MICA's identity is based on the amorphic nature of the rocks, the asymmetry of their profiles and their unique existence no two rocks are alike making all of MICA's pieces truly unique. The interior spaces are based on an extensive grid system, strongly influenced by the work of Sol Lewitt, particularly his "Variations of Incomplete Open Cubes". The displays, exclusively conceived and produced for MICA, offer an organic contrast against the more rigid backdrop of the space they are contained in.
item.content:encoded: MICA is a contemporary jewellery house which specialises in custom made pieces. Its name derives from a group of minerals that are characterised by their malleability which makes them ideal for various uses some which are purely aesthetic. Expanding its most basic and primitive character, MICA's identity is based on the amorphic nature of the rocks, the asymmetry of their profiles and their unique existence no two rocks are alike making all of MICA's pieces truly unique. The interior spaces are based on an extensive grid system, strongly influenced by the work of Sol Lewitt, particularly his "Variations of Incomplete Open Cubes". The displays, exclusively conceived and produced for MICA, offer an organic contrast against the more rigid backdrop of the space they are contained in.

item.title: ICONIC
item.description: This is a self initiated project that has been going on for 2 years. The biggest challenge in technical terms was to preserve the same style throughout even though the four main artists presented here are very different to one another. The whole idea behind this project was to create a style bold enough to fit any music artist without distorting his/her identity.
item.content:encoded: This is a self initiated project that has been going on for 2 years. The biggest challenge in technical terms was to preserve the same style throughout even though the four main artists presented here are very different to one another. The whole idea behind this project was to create a style bold enough to fit any music artist without distorting his/her identity.

item.title: Skol
item.description: Skol was forged in the fire over many months of constant revisions. Our hard work paid off after one week of constantly redrawing letters and changing the form. On or off the screen, Skol is a tenacious, hardy font that would make its ancestors proud.
item.content:encoded: Skol was forged in the fire over many months of constant revisions. Our hard work paid off after one week of constantly redrawing letters and changing the form. On or off the screen, Skol is a tenacious, hardy font that would make its ancestors proud.

item.title: Fake Retro-Future Ads - 2043 Magazine
item.description: This are 4 fake posters commisioned by the guys at Almasty (France) to illustrate a note on the possible future 30 years from now, to be featured in Altavia?s 2043 Magazine. Each one represents an imaginary ad for future products, inspired in the 4 different chapters of the note.
item.content:encoded: This are 4 fake posters commisioned by the guys at Almasty (France) to illustrate a note on the possible future 30 years from now, to be featured in Altavia?s 2043 Magazine. Each one represents an imaginary ad for future products, inspired in the 4 different chapters of the note.

item.title: MagnaGlobal Media Economy Report Vol.2
item.description: Editorial- and Information-Design for MagnaGlobal's second Media Economy Report. MagnaGlobal is the strategic global media unit of IPG Mediabrands. The report provides an essential guide to the state of mobile marketing today, trends to watch for in future, and key insights to unlock mobile media value. The report, the second of its kind from MAGNA GLOBAL, identifies new findings and data-driven insights into the mobile media economy.
item.content:encoded: Editorial- and Information-Design for MagnaGlobal's second Media Economy Report. MagnaGlobal is the strategic global media unit of IPG Mediabrands. The report provides an essential guide to the state of mobile marketing today, trends to watch for in future, and key insights to unlock mobile media value. The report, the second of its kind from MAGNA GLOBAL, identifies new findings and data-driven insights into the mobile media economy.

item.title: voodoo in West Africa
item.description: I photographed many voodoo ceremonies,the temple of pythons, the sacred forest of Ouidah, rites of initiation, the fetish market of lome, masks Zangbeto, egungun, gelede mask,Nigerian masks, fire ceremony in Togo.
